name: Amul Milk
description: It's packed with important nutrients like calcium, phosphorus, B vitamins, potassium and vitamin D. Plus, it's an excellent source of protein. Drinking milk and dairy products may prevent osteoporosis and bone fractures and even help you maintain a healthy weight

name: Patanjali Ghee
description: Patanjali country cow ghee is the pure form of ghee. We can not trust the cow ghee which is available in markets.

name: Dabur Honey
description: Helps in weight management by burning fat even when the body is at rest. Boosts Brain Function. It improves brain function, improves memory and boosts concentration power. Cures Hair Fall. Fights dandruff and hair fall while moisturising hair. Fights Dermal Problems.

name: Safola oil
description: Helps Reduce Bad Cholesterol. High levels of bad cholesterol is known to increase the risk of heart disease. Losorb Technology. Saffola Gold has Losorb Technology which ensures upto 20% less oil absorption^ in food, as compared to other leading cooking oils. Benefit of 2 oils.

name: California Almond
description: Almonds contain lots of healthy fats, fiber, protein, magnesium and vitamin E. The health benefits of almonds include lower blood sugar levels, reduced blood pressure and lower cholesterol levels. They can also reduce hunger and promote weight loss.
